sentences.english: My husband and I bought a house by divided payment, around which was filled with hibiscuses.
sentences.chinese: 買了一套房子，小區裏種滿了木槿。

sentences.english: Two people hired a house to live in blue lake village.
sentences.chinese: 兩人在藍湖小區租了一套房子居住。

sentences.english: It is in the DX community, Room 306, No.2 building.
That makes it extremely maneuverable in tight, crowded quarters.
sentences.chinese: 那使得它在緊迫又擁擠的小區城市中，極端容易操作。

sentences.english: Even if they built small, certainly no place to go Yang Nainiu.
sentences.chinese: 即使他們建成的小區，肯定也沒地方去養奶牛。

sentences.english: Traffic noise in this housing estate was assessed using Noise Impact Index (NII).
sentences.chinese: 應用噪聲衝擊指數法對小區交通噪聲進行總體評價。

sentences.english: Qingdao City Subway Ride on the 4th line and the base station is located on the west side district.
sentences.chinese: 青島市地鐵一號線和四號換乘站位於小區基地西側。

sentences.english: An alarm system for residence district based on CAN-bus is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於CAN總線的住宅小區安防系統。

sentences.english: Mrs. Li takes her dog Mimi for a walk after dinner every day in their neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 李天太每天晚飯後都要帶她的小狗咪咪在小區裏散步。

sentences.english: If it’s cold out, take a quick lap around the block.
sentences.chinese: 假如外面是寒冷的，那就繞着小區快跑一圈。

sentences.english: Luck small district is a modern residence district on Liaohe oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 遼河油田幸福小區是一個現代化的生活小區。

sentences.english: Luck small district is a modern residence district on Liaohe oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 遼河油田幸福小區是一個現代化的生活小區。

sentences.english: To be sure, it was a beautiful little cottage.
sentences.chinese: 渡上是北京市一個高檔別墅小區。

sentences.english: Determined to make her neighborhood safe, she confronted the ringleaders .
sentences.chinese: 爲了居住小區的安全，她決定勇敢的面對元兇。

sentences.english: She posted an advertisement seeking a house on the housing estate's bulletin board.
sentences.chinese: 她在小區的佈告欄裏貼出了求售房屋的廣告。

sentences.english: Small residential areas have become a priority with the Ministry of Construction.
sentences.chinese: 建設居民小區是建設部要優先解決的問題。

definition: (used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
